correspondence.message: I want to understand the elective credit requirements for my Master's program, specifically regarding the total of 53 elective credits and the implications of exceeding these credits, particularly for free electives. Can I take extra courses, and will they count towards my GPA?"

The German courses you wish to take count towards support electives, not the required elective courses. There are no negative consequences for exceeding the required credits; you can choose which courses will count towards your GPA at the end of your studies.
